room_title: Escape room "Top of the Charts - Seattle Style" by Reality Break Escapes in Seattle
review: I really enjoyed the top of the charts escape room. The idea of the room is to work together as a team to solve puzzles, but I really enjoyed how this room incorporated musical elements into the mix as well.

room_title: Escape room "Top of the Charts - Seattle Style" by Reality Break Escapes in Seattle
review: I've done 2 rooms here -- the Speakeasy and Top of the Charts. Both were so much fun, although I liked Top of the Charts better. The puzzles are hard but not too hard, and they have a good variety. And their staff is so nice! I would definitely recommend this place to others.

room_title: Escape room "Top of the Charts - Seattle Style" by Reality Break Escapes in Seattle
review: We do escape rooms regularly and were delighted that another area opened in Bellevue!   My wife and I did "Top of the Charts" together (we often try to duo, getting as far as we can).  It was a fantastic thematic room, on par with the best rooms in the area.  Lots and lots of content -- even if you are experienced with room escape rooms, I'd take 4 to this one.  The puzzles were varied, interesting, and fun. We will definitely go back for the other two rooms.
